then there is a function callled FindBankQuiet…which finds bank and opens it…thebn use depositall; or something liek that

item.title: Help plz im working on a willow cutter
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

i think its because the procedure bank is not in this part:

[quote=“meanz, post:1, topic:9689”]begin
LoadLibrary(‘MSN Messenger (BETA)’);

repeat
FindTree1;
FindTree2;
until times = 2;
end.[/quote]

its gotta be something like
begin
LoadLibrary(‘MSN Messenger (BETA)’);

repeat
FindTree1;
FindTree2;
bank;
el;
until times = 2;
end.
hope it helps

Read full topic
item.source: Help plz im working on a willow cutter

item.title: Help plz im working on a willow cutter
item.dc:creator: @meanz meanz
item.description:
@meanz wrote:

this is my script
[scar]program MeanzPowerCutter;
{.include sslibrary.txt}
const
Tcl1 = 2902352;
Tcl2 = 6062224;
Wcl = 4155248;
BankSymbol = 4310238;
times = 1;
//Find bank
procedure bank;
begin
findmmcolor(x,y,BankSymbol) if(not(findmmcolor(x,y,banksymbol)))then writeln(‘Cant find banksymbol.’)
movemousesmooth(x,y)
wait(500)
mouse(x,y,2,2,true)
flag;
openbank3;
wait(1000)
fixbank;
deposit(2,28,2);
wait(1000)
TotalBankings := TotalBankings + 1
writeln(‘All willows deposited’);
end;
procedure el;
var mx,my:integer;
begin
Mouse(674,41,2,2,true);
wait(15000);
Mouse(215,201,2,2,true);
wait(1000)
Mouse(303,446,2,2,true);
wait(1000)
Mouse(264,389,2,2,true);
wait(1000)
Mouse(669,228,2,2,true);
end;
//End of finding bank
//Find tree1
procedure FindTree1;
var px,py: integer;
var ux,uy: integer;
begin
if(FindColorSpiral(px,py,Tcl1,4,4,514,337))then
begin
MMouse(px,py,1,1);
if(IsTextAt2(9,9,‘Chop down Willow’,100))then
begin
Mouse(px,py,0,0,true);
wait(2000);
repeat
if(FindColorSpiral(ux,uy,4344504,4,4,514,337))then
begin
bank();
end else
wait(1000);
until(not(IsTextAt2(9,9,‘Chop down Willow’,100)))
end;
end;
end;
//End of tree finding1
//Find tree2
procedure FindTree2;
var px,py: integer;
var ux,uy: integer;
begin
if(FindColorSpiral(px,py,Tcl2,4,4,514,337))then
begin
MMouse(px,py,1,1);
if(IsTextAt2(9,9,‘Chop down Willow’,100))then
begin
Mouse(px,py,0,0,true);
wait(2000);
repeat
wait(1000);
if(FindColorSpiral(ux,uy,Wcl,4,4,514,337))then
begin
bank();
end else
wait(100);
until(not(IsTextAt2(9,9,‘Chop down Willow’,100)))
end;
end;
end;
//End of tree finding2
begin
LoadLibrary(‘MSN Messenger (BETA)’);

repeat
FindTree1;
FindTree2;
until times = 2;
end.[/scar]
i cant get the banking to work please help?
i dun think its the color…-.-

Read full topic
